TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: You are turned into C3 PO.

I wish for escapism television.

Granted.You watch tv and escape reality to end up in the middle of a void.

I wish to make a kopernicus planet in real life.
Granted. You ARE the planet, sorta like Ego.

Wish not found. Error 666 wild corruption. You become lunarchihuahua.

i wish for lasagna, garlic bread and a tasty beverage for all of us.

091102062024

Granted. You have a lasergun, a piece of bread with garlic, and a flask of True Blood. Welcome to the Vampire Hunters Siblinghood.

I wish for chi(hua)2 tetrafluoride.

Granted, but wish granting-corruption system is overloaded due to confusing the ai after the previous Error. Reality crashes.

I wish for my Switch to have good performance.

Granted, but you can't find it anymore.

I wish I could have a real-life Portal Gun.

10 hours ago, Kimera Industries said:

Granted, but you can't find it anymore.

I wish I could have a real-life Portal Gun.

Granted, it is a portal gun to the Minecraft nether, where hundreds of fires will spawn from.

I wish for a pancake plane

Granted.  Unfortunately, you were in it when it got flattened, so now you are a pancake too.  A very flat, red-smear of a pancake.  Alas, poor Jcool, we knew him well.

I wish I was a supermassive black hole.

2 minutes ago, Scarecrow71 said:

Granted.  Unfortunately, you were in it when it got flattened, so now you are a pancake too.  A very flat, red-smear of a pancake.  Alas, poor Jcool, we knew him well.

I wish I was a supermassive black hole.

Granted, universe whizzes by you as time goes far into the future. after billions of years you witness the last star being born, a trillion years later, you see it die. As the universe ages to the extreme, there are now balls of iron that slowly fuse over 10^1000 years. After an indescribably long amount of time (somewhere around 10^10^1000 years), you evaporate.

I wish for an all wing oblique wing plane

Granted. Its other parts are oblique, too. Though, it's no motor onboard.

I wish to know, are they completing or disassembling that building far behind the trees, in front of formerly my school.

(They are doing this not the first year, and sometimes this is looking different.)

Granted. They're just taking these assets to teach basic disassembling and reassembling, what did you really expect?

I wish that my forum account wasn't hacked past year.

Granted, but everything else is.

I wish for sleep.

Granted.  Everyone gets to go to sleep, except for you.  You get to stay awake and never get to sleep again.

I wish @Ryaja could get some sleep.

Granted: They go to sleep for a year.

I wish to perservere.

Granted. Except the wish-granting system doesn't recognize the word "perservere" due to the extra "r".

I wish to be able to utilize the weekend to catch up on sleep, instead of being locked into weekday schedule.

Granted, but weekends are no longer a thing.  You get nothing but weekdays.

I wish for perpetual Saturdays.

Granted. You already do have it.

I wish for Weekend Wednesday.

Granted. The side effect is that CGP Grey requires you to beat his one-in-a-million rock-paper-scissors course.

I wish I could always play KSP at 120 fps.

Granted, but you are now always frustrated it is 120 fps and not 121 fps

 

I wish for a rock

Granted. It's The Rock, and you are forced to be in the state of a perpetual eyebrow raise. Like this:

I wish I lived in the Joe Orbital Universe.

Spoiler

Granted: You are now in 2d and trapped within a panel.

I wish I had famous eyebrows.

Granted.  Your eyebrows are more famous than Taylor Swift, and they have a schedule to keep.  With a guest list that you aren't part of, so they are permanently removed so they can enjoy living in the limelight.  You, on the other hand, are not famous and eyebrow-less.

I wish I had a career in professional wrestling.

Granted, but you become so famous that you cannot be in public without being swarmed.

I wish I had an F-22 Raptor.

Granted, but you have to pay for it. And there's a slight water stain on the airframe, so you have to spend a few more million to repair it.

I wish I had an (wait for it) F/A-18E Super Hornet Block III, with two drop tanks on the wings, an IRST-integrated centerline drop tank, two AIM-120 AMRAAMs, a LITENING targeting pod, etc.
